code: import React,{useState}from'react';import javaParser from'java-parser';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JavaCodeAnalyzer=()=>{const[javaCode,setJavaCode]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const analyzeJavaCode=()=>{try{const parsedResult=javaParser.parse(javaCode);setResult(parsedResult);}catch(error){console.error('Error analyzing Java code:',error);setResult(null);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{rows:"10",cols:"80",value:javaCode,onChange:e=>setJavaCode(e.target.value),placeholder:"Paste your Java code here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:analyzeJavaCode,children:"Analyze Java Code"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-bold mb-2",children:"Analysis Result:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})]})]});};export default JavaCodeAnalyzer;
